issue.title: [C++] min_element_wise/max_element_wise missing support for some types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13950](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13950). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The min/max element wise kernels should support all sortable types.  Currently support is missing for:

 - decimal
 - null
 - binary
 - large_binary
 - fixed_size_binary
 - string
 - large_string
